auth.registrationSuccess: Registration successful! You can now sign in with your credentials.
auth.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

registerEvent.title: Register Your Event
registerEvent.subtitle: Join our platform and reach thousands of event-goers. Fill out the form below to submit your event for review and approval.

organizer.title: Organizer Information
organizer.subtitle: Tell us about yourself and your organization

placeholders.organizationDescription: Brief description of your organization and experience in event management...

placeholders.eventDescription: Describe your event, what makes it special, target audience, activities, performers, etc...

dateTime.title: Date & Time Information
dateTime.subtitle: When will your event take place?

guidelines.title: Date Guidelines
rules: Event must be at least 30 days from submission date
Multi-day events should include all event days
Consider setup and breakdown time in your planning

location.title: Location Information
location.subtitle: Where will your event be held?

details.title: Event Details & Pricing
details.subtitle: Provide details about attendance and pricing

placeholders.specialRequirements: Any special equipment, setup requirements, or considerations...

agreement.title: Legal Information & Agreement
agreement.subtitle: Final details and terms acceptance
agreement.permitsObtained: I have obtained or will obtain all necessary permits and licenses
agreement.termsAccepted: I agree to the Terms of Service and Event Organizer Agreement
agreement.dataProcessingAccepted: I consent to the processing of my personal data as described in the Privacy Policy

reviewProcess.title: Review Process
rules: Applications are reviewed within 3-5 business days
We may request additional information or documentation
Approved events will be contacted to complete setup
A 5% platform fee applies to all ticket sales

placeholders.insuranceInfo: Details about your event insurance coverage...
placeholders.emergencyPlan: Brief description of your emergency and safety plan...

notifications.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields before proceeding.
notifications.ensureRequired: Please ensure all required fields are filled and agreements are accepted.
notifications.processingApplication: Please wait while we process your application.
notifications.reviewMessage: We'll review your application and contact you within 3-5 business days.
notifications.checkConnection: Please check your connection and try again.

success.title: Application Submitted Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for submitting your event registration request. Our team will review your application and get back to you within 3-5 business days.

nextSteps.title: What happens next?
steps: We may contact you for additional information
Once approved, we'll help you set up your event listing
